inclusion.criterion: Able to provide written informed consent prior to screening and willing to comply with the requirements of the study protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have had a diagnosis of ulcerative colitis or Crohn's Disease confirmed by a clinician
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have had quiescent disease for the past 3 months or longer as determined by clinician
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Have had most recent episode of disease within past 24 months as determined by clinician
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have had stable IBD medication (other than antibiotics) regimen for the past 3 months or longer
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Able to speak and read English sufficiently
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Be able and comfortable using new technology: the app and the smartwatch for 12 months
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: If female, is pregnant or is breast feeding, or intends to become pregnant within the 12 month study period
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to provide informed consent or unwilling to participate
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of oral or intravenous antibiotics within 4 weeks prior to screening
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current use of glucocorticoid steroid, or nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) within the last 3 months
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of untreated infection e.g. Clostridium difficile
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Confirmed diagnosis of extraintestinal manifestations (EIMs) of disease including those that occur concurrent with colitis (episcleritis, scleritis, uveitis, peripheral arthropathies of small and large joints, dermatologic conditions such as erythema nodosum and pyoderma gangrenosum), and those that occur independent of colitis (sacroilitis, ankylosing spondylitis, or primary sclerosing cholangitis)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Confirmed diagnosis of other serious disease unrelated to ulcerative colitis or Crohn's Disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool, which may indicate an untreated infection.
